title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin is to see supplication in a dream

preview.html: Prayer in a dream Prayer is a means by which the servant approaches his Creator, and by it he invites him to fulfill his hopes, achieve his goals, and fulfill his will. There is no doubt that begging is one of the common visions in the world of dreams, which receives great attention from jurists, and in this article we take a look at all the connotations and interpretations of the vision of begging, as well as listing the details and situations. That affects the context. The petition may be a warning, warning, notice, or good news, and this is specified in the following points. Prayer in a dream Seeing a supplication expresses the achievement of goals, the attainment of goals, the satisfaction of needs, the payment of debts, the relief of worries, the triumph of victory, the attainment of sovereignty, high status and fame, and the achievement of Desired and desired. Achieving goals. Whoever dreams that he is praying to God in his dream, this indicates goodness and abundance of livelihood, facilitating a complicated matter, changing circumstances for the better, wealth after poverty, contentment with money, charity, and charity. If the supplication is hidden, it indicates coverage, blessing, and reward. And feeding the blessed son, increasing worldly pleasures, escaping calamities and misfortunes, trusting God, sincerity of intentions, and purity of the heart. And if the supplication is for anyone other than God, then this symbolizes disbelief, corruption of faith, suspicion, heresy in religion, wavering certainty in the heart, hypocrisy and temptation. Supplication in a dream By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that supplication is recommended while awake and asleep and is interpreted in terms of goodness, happiness, certainty, good faith, sincerity of intention, determination, wealth, giving, benefits, divine providence, meeting with God, rejecting falsehood and staying away from it. . People, and they are fighting for the law. Whoever sees a supplication in a dream, this indicates the approach of an important event, heavy rain, or the appearance of a calamity among the people, according to God Almighty’s saying: (If it were not for us). When Our punishment came to them, they were praying “as it indicates the satisfaction of needs and the achievement of the goals that God Almighty tells you: And if the supplication contains cries or screams accompanied by lamentation, this indicates calamity or affliction and misfortunes, the spread of temptations and doubts among people, the succession of worries and sorrows, the occurrence of embarrassment, and the occurrence of In gains. As for intense prayer, it can indicate rain and semi-rest. What is the interpretation of a dream of begging in a dream for a single woman? Beginning in a singles dream symbolizes achieving goals and objectives, achieving objectives, reaping absent wishes after a long wait, responding to begging in a state of alert, and achieving the goal after patience and Effort. What is the interpretation of saying, “O Lord,” in a dream for an unmarried woman? This vision shows trust in God, and asks Him for help and assistance to get out of adversity and escape from dangers and evils. And if you see that he is praying over a person, then he may harm that person, or he may insult her, or participate in her display, or fabricate an accusation against him, or slander him, so he will run away. From his conspiracy. And God will save her from his evil and harm. Friday prayer in a dream for single people. This vision indicates goodness, blessing, good circumstances, completion of matters, success, distinction, success, achieving the desired, overcoming difficulties, and the end of times.

title: The correct evidence for interpreting the dream of money in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of money in a dream in detail. Perhaps seeing money in the dreamer’s dream is one of the visions that bring joy and comfort to his heart as well as to his wakefulness, and this matter is due to the human spirit and the nature of the dreamer, as seeing money is interpreted in a more general way that it can be evidence of the goodness that Come to Him, and He can bring Him. Evil and disasters, and therefore there are many interpretations that symbolize this vision, and what concerns us in this context is to clarify the general interpretation. From seeing money. Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream. Seeing money in a dream symbolizes what awaits the dreamer in the future, what he is constantly thinking about and what occupies all his time and controls his mind. The vision indicates constant involvement in work, trade, markets, and free enterprise, and excessive interest in profits and gains that The dreamer earns it from these projects. There is an opinion that says that seeing money does not only come from evil, conflict, and strife. The vision indicates many disagreements between people and falling into the trap of this world and the inability to escape from it. It also indicates indulgence in desires, an abundance of fears, going in unwanted ways, and the dreamer’s attachment to the world and his gradual withdrawal from the world of truth. Therefore, we find that this group believes that Getting rid of money in a dream is a good vision that symbolizes the death of worries and sorrow. If the dreamer sees that he earns money and throws it out of his house or gives it to someone, this is a sign of freedom from worldly restrictions and a feeling that he can fly away from the sources that cause him problems and anxiety. The vision symbolizes comfort after distress, improving the situation, achieving the goal, and achieving brilliant success. This dream symbolizes the problems and crises that the dreamer will overcome, no matter how long it takes. Finding money may be a repulsive matter, but thanks to his wisdom and strong strength, he will overcome it and reach his goal. It is said that money symbolizes the pursuit of knowledge, travel, constant travel, meeting people’s needs, and paying debts. It also symbolizes high status, high status, obtaining what is wanted, and enjoying power and strength. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s dream of money in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of this vision depends mainly on the number of currencies. The coin and its interpretation are as follows: Whoever sees in a dream that his money exceeds four, this is a sign of the unbearable difficulties and problems that have been created for him in the places where he works. Ibn Shaheen claims that if the fortuneteller knows the number of his coins or knows the number of coins, this indicates crises. And simple disagreements can come out of it. If the number of coins is five, this may be a reference to the five prayers, many acts of worship, good deeds, and staying away from forbidden things. Money also symbolizes the following. If the dreamer sees that he found it and was poor, then this vision indicates a change. Status, livelihood, and wealth are from God. But if he finds it and does not need it, this may indicate the sadness and distress that will befall him, which means that the dreamer may pass

title: Learn about the interpretation of dreams about teeth falling out from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about teeth falling out Teeth falling out is one of the common dreams that are often searched for clues about it. Experts say that tooth loss has different interpretations depending on the number of teeth falling out and their location in the mouth. In our article, we explain what does a dream about teeth falling out mean? Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out according to Ibn Sirin Interpretation of dreams about teeth falling out Interpretation scholars are divided in the vision of teeth falling out, because the position of the tooth and its appearance with the appearance of blood or pain gives it many interpretations. Al-Nabulsi believes that teeth falling out all at once is an indication of the great need that a person will be exposed to and the loss of the largest part of his money, which causes him great sadness. However, if it falls, but he holds it in his hand, this is a sign of longevity and a life full of good things that he will receive. Most commentators say that the teeth at the bottom indicate women, while the teeth at the top are a sign of men, and therefore the tooth falling from the top or bottom has a different sign. As for the falling of the canine tooth, it has undesirable indications, as it indicates the loss of the leader and the person responsible for the house, and it may be the father or grandfather. As for the falling of rotten or black teeth, it is good news for the fortune teller, as it confirms his escape from dangers and escape from adversity. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out according to Ibn Sirin He proves that the falling out of a tooth is one of the visions that must be focused on in detail, because each one has a specific meaning Therefore, losing one of them can indicate the loss of a family member. Someone close to the dreamer may leave with his appearance and travel to a distant country and will not be able to see him again, and God knows best. While loose teeth without falling out can be a clear warning that the person may suffer from a serious illness or lose a large part of his health. It is expected that whoever has all his teeth fall on his hand or clothes, that is, he did not lose them and fall to the ground, the dream is a sign for him and does not express loss or hatred. Ibn Sirin believes that this vision is one of the hateful visions, which most interpreters agree is not very good. Interpretation of dreams of teeth falling out Teeth falling out in unmarried women indicates a difficult period and sad events that occur in it, and it can be very stressful physically as well. There is a group of dream interpreters who see their appearance as a symbol of marriage and the engagement of the girl becomes official early, God willing. Some express this dream with the idea of ​​​​the girl's psychological need to have companions in her life such as lovers and friends, because she lacks this feeling and needs support and help. The girl may be in a state of constant thinking due to many things in her life, and this results in some tension and tension, and from here you see this dream that expresses instability. To find out other interpretations of Ibn Sirin's dreams, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site ... You will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of dreams of the upper teeth falling out for unmarried women The interpretation of the dream of the upper teeth falling out varies according to the interpretation

title: Seeing a prisoner leaving prison in a dream

preview.html: There is no doubt that every dream has its own interpretation, so in this article from our website we will discuss a translator explaining some of the interpretations related to this vision. Interpretation of a prisoner leaving prison in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees a prisoner leaving prison, this indicates the nearness of marriage, God willing. Also It indicates the fulfillment of happy hopes and dreams that may be impossible, and God knows best. Seeing a prisoner leaving prison is evidence of freedom and independence, as well as joy, pleasure and happiness. Releasing a prisoner in one dream may indicate the end of worries and concerns, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream Its meaning in detail is the interpretation of a prisoner leaving prison in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a prisoner leaving prison indicates a dream for a married woman. Because some problems will arise between her and her husband, which may lead her to divorce, and God knows best. It also indicates the release of a prisoner from his prison in a married woman’s dream. With her exit. About the infallibility of her husband and her ability to get rid of the problems between them, which made her feel like a prisoner in her home, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees that her husband has been released from prison. This suggests her husband’s innocence of some of the charges against him. Which makes his life turn into happiness and joy, God willing, Because he did not do anything wrong, and God knows best. Or if he sees a married woman entering prison. This indicates some fears and anxiety that appear in her. Which makes her suffer a lot in her married life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man coming out of prison and its meaning: seeing a man coming out of prison in a dream It portends a lot of goodness and nourishment. It is also considered one of the meanings of destroying worries and concerns, God willing. It also indicates a vision of getting out of prison in a man’s dream. That he will marry a good, righteous girl in the coming period, God willing. In the event that you see entering prison and dying inside it. This is an indication of The disputes and problems will end and the trial will end soon, God willing. When you see a familiar face coming out of prison in a man’s dream, this indicates some profits and gains in the near future, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream Interpretation of seeing a prisoner being released from prison in a dream Pregnant woman and its interpretation: Seeing your release from prison in a pregnant woman’s dream is approaching her due date, God willing. However, in the case of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, she is in prison. This indicates that she is suffering from some problems related to pregnancy, which may expose her to danger and miscarriage, and God knows best. If the pregnant woman She dreams of being released from prison. This indicates that worries and worries will disappear, God willing, and that joy will inevitably come to them. When a pregnant woman dreams of being released from prison and falling ill. This indicates her recovery from illness, God willing. Seeing a pregnant woman leaving an unknown prison in a dream means Her term is approaching, and God knows best. This may indicate that she will give birth safely and will not be harmed, God willing. This vision indicates that she will give birth in the next few days, God willing. She must prepare for that day when she will receive her child with joy and happiness, God willing. You may also be interested

title: Interpretation of seeing a bedroom in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bedroom in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the bedroom is an important detail that must be looked for in the interpretation of dreams, especially if the shape of the bedroom is uncomfortable or includes some wonderful details that can convey messages related to real life that are of interest to the viewer. There are many interpretations related to the metaphor of the bedroom in dream interpretation books, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a bedroom in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bedroom in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Sleep symbolizes the dreamer's feeling of stability, security, and reassurance. Seeing a dreamer's bedroom in a dream is a sign of the social and professional life of the pioneer. A promising vision is to dream that you are inside a spacious bedroom. It indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer's desires. If the bedroom in the dream is narrow. This vision shows that the dreamer is facing problems and crises in his life. When a person sees in his dream that he is inside an elegant and beautiful bedroom. This means that people love and appreciate him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is sitting in his bedroom. Looking at him showed that he is living a good life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bedroom furniture for people in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream an arranged bedroom. Her vision indicated that the goals she was striving for would come true. A single girl’s dream of having someone in her bedroom is a sign that God will bless her with a beautiful life and good luck. Whoever sees in his dream a blue bedroom. Her vision shows that she will succeed in her studies and work. But if the bedroom appears white in the dream of an unmarried woman. This indicates a pure heart. If the dreamer is happy being in this room in the dream. The dream shows her relationship with the right person. When a single woman dreams that she is changing her bedroom. This means that he will get married soon. A promising vision is to see a single girl in a bedroom with a window. It shows that the dreamer's future will be beautiful and bright. Seeing bedding in the bedroom in an unmarried girl's dream means that she will marry a good young man. The bedroom closet in a dream for a single woman symbolizes that the dreamer will obtain many good things, while the painting shows the safe life that the dreamer leads A single girl who buys a new white bedroom in a dream shows that she has overcome the financial crises she is going through. But if someone had gifted this room to the pioneer. This means that he will hear good news in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bedroom furniture for a married woman in a dream: A dream about a bedroom in a dream for a married woman symbolizes that she is living a stable and happy life with her husband. Seeing an organized bedroom in a married woman’s dream indicates that God Almighty May the Almighty give her happiness and peace of mind. If the bedroom appears in the dream of an old married woman. This means that the dreamer likes to live in past memories. It is an auspicious dream for a married woman to sit on her bedroom bed. This vision expresses imminent pregnancy

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a male child in a dream is one of the visions that many interpreters have talked about. This vision can sometimes be interpreted at face value. It can also be interpreted with precise interpretations that depend on the psychological state of the fortuneteller or according to his social circumstances. Therefore, you are presented with a different website. In this article, the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream in detail. The interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees a smiling male child in a dream, whether the dreamer is male or female, the meaning of this vision indicates the benefit and goodness of the dreamer. If a male child cries in a dream loudly and the dreamer cannot calm him down, this is a sign of projects that will be disturbed in the dreamer’s life and fears that will affect his heart. If one sees in a dream a male child walking on his feet, then this vision expresses the peace that will come to the dreamer’s heart. As the child in most visions indicates gains and profits. Imam Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever sees a child walking next to him in a dream. The interpretation of this vision is that there is something that the dreamer intends to do, and seeing this child next to him and accompanying him is a harbinger of the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of desired goals. The interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s closeness to his Lord and the intensity of his faith if he holds the hand of that child. Interpretation of seeing a male child In a dream for a single woman, the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the interpretations that indicates the joy that fills all aspects of the dreamer’s life. Major interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen met in the positive interpretation. Seeing a male child in one dream, even if they do not agree on a meaning to interpret the vision. The positive interpretations given by commentators for seeing a male child in one dream can be summarized as follows: Engagement and marriage: where the male child indicates the entry of the unmarried girl into a new phase of her life, This stage expresses the transition from a life of celibacy to a life of sexual intercourse, and if this child is beautiful in appearance, then this is a blessed sign of the completion of marriage with the one he loves and is characterized by perfect character. Hearing good news: Seeing a male child in a person’s dream may represent hearing news that pleases one’s heart, In addition to getting rid of all worries and problems in a radical way and improving the dreamer’s condition. Ability to take responsibility: If an unmarried girl sees that she is carrying a male child in her arms, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is responsible for himself and can take responsibility for others because of his dedication, discipline and ability. To solve problems. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream when she is a married woman. If a married woman sees a male child in a dream and this child needs to be cared for, the interpretation of this vision is that the dreamer will face a number of problems and difficulties in her life. If a married woman sees a beautiful male child and feels happy when she She sees her, the interpretation of this dream is that she will hear news that will rejoice her heart and relieve her of her worries and sorrows. title: Interpretation of a dream about confusion in prayer

preview.html: Many interpreters and legal interpreters came to this dream with different opinions, which will be explained in the following lines of our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing confusion in prayer in a dream about a single girl and an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that her prayer is not disciplined, and she prays with the worshipers, Its rulings appear. The girl who dreams of being confused in prayer in her dream is evidence that there are many problems that fill her life and she cannot escape from them. The dream also shows the girl that her life is full of worries, problems, and sorrows. Also seeing the dream, this indicates that she is distracted in reality and cannot concentrate. On the issues of her life. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is confused in prayer, and does not focus on the recitations, shows that she is far from her religion. If a girl in a dream is confused by prayer and trying to repeat it, this indicates that she is concerned about her future and is trying to succeed. The vision of a single woman In her dream, someone talks to her during prayer and leaves her, so this is a sign of a problem. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream and its importance according to Nabulus. Interpretation of seeing confusion in prayer in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is not being disciplined in prayer is evidence that it is a warning of repentance. The woman A married woman who dreams that her prayer in a dream is incorrect indicates that she needs to get closer to God. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is confused about prayer while performing it shows her a strict warning from God. Seeing a married woman in her dream where some people try to get her out of prayer indicates That her enemies surround her. A woman who sees in her dream that there is someone pushing her forward during prayer, this indicates that her enemies are around her. A married woman who sees herself in a dream confused about her matter while reciting prayer surahs indicates that she is surrounded by unhealthy people. These appear The vision that she is disobedient to her husband and this is a sign that she will divorce him soon. For a married woman who interferes in her prayer and continues to pray without paying attention, this indicates that she is suffering from many problems. But dreaming of the joy of prayer and seeing a married woman in this dream indicates the appearance of an illness for her and may lead to Her death. Interpretation of seeing confusion in prayer in a dream about the man and its meaning. Confusion in prayer in a man’s dream means that he will face many problems in life, but he will overcome them soon. A man who dreams of a mistake occurring in his prayer and its exposure indicates misfortunes that he will overcome with patience in the future. As for Whoever sees in his dream that he makes a mistake in his prayer, this is evidence of the worry and anxiety that he is experiencing now. This dream may indicate that there is a hypocritical person with him and he hates him, but he does not know it, and that is why he must be very careful. Whoever dreams that he makes a mistake in his prayer during prayer Evidence of the presence of enemies who would like to harm him. Whoever dreams that he is praying in a dream and makes mistakes and does not complete it, this indicates that he is suffering from seizures. Read also: Interpretation of seeing church prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing confusion in prayer in a dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream and killing it at the hands of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it It confuses the dreamers and makes them desperate to understand what is being presented to them, and in the following article we will discuss the most important interpretations related to this topic, so let’s read them below. Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it The dreamer seeing a snake in a dream and killing it indicates that he will be able to get rid of the scammers who have surrounded him from all The authorities and protect him from their evil. If a person sees a snake in his dream and kills it, this is a sign of his ability to overcome the difficulties that prevented him from achieving his goals. If the dreamer sees the snake in his sleep and kills it, this represents his solution to many problems that were hindering his life and he will feel more comfortable after that. The dreamer seeing a snake in a dream and killing it means that he overcame the crises he faced in his work and the situation stabilized after that. Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it at the hands of Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer seeing a snake in a dream and killing it as a sign of getting rid of the problems that prevented him from focusing on his goals. If Someone saw a snake in his dream and killed it, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will help solve the financial crisis he was facing. In the event that the dreamer sees the snake in his sleep and kills it, this means that he overcame the obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals and the path before him will be paved. After that.For the dreamer to see in a dream about a snake and kill it means that he will get rid of his enemies, far superior to them, and be safe from the machinations that they have planned for him.Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it for an unmarried woman.For an unmarried woman to see a snake in a dream and kill it means that she will be able It helps get rid of many of the problems that she faced in the previous days and will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees a snake in his dream and kills it, this means that she realizes that she is close to someone who has malicious intentions and approaches her and will immediately move away from him. In the event that the dreamer sees a snake in his dream and kills it This indicates that one of her close friends has betrayed her, and she has entered into a state of extreme sadness over her trust that was in vain. For a girl to see a snake in her dream and kill it symbolizes that she will overcome the difficulties that have plagued her life and will be more focused on her goals after that. Seeing a snake in Dreaming about killing a married woman: A married woman who sees a snake in a dream and it kills her shows her ability to resolve the differences that prevailed in her relationship with her husband in the previous period and things will return between them as they were in the past. If the dreamer sees a snake during his sleep and kills it, this is a sign that she got rid of a malicious woman who was trying to get close. To destroy her life and spoil the stability of her home. If the dreamer sees a snake in his dream and kills it, this means that he will obtain abundant money that will enable him to overcome a financial crisis that was hindering his livelihood. Seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes her great wisdom that makes her able to face crises in her life. In a good way. Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman seeing a snake in a dream and killing it means that she will be patient with the many pains that she endures.

title: Interpretation of a dream about biscuits in Al-Osaimi’s dream

See also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about cookies in a dream Al-OsaimiInterpretation of a dream about cookies in a dream Al-OsaimiMany people see cookies in a dream and do not know if this is one of them. Things that indicate good things or that indicate bad things. This is what we will present in this paragraph to Imam Al-Usaimi: If someone sees cookies in a dream and this person is not able to keep cookies in the dream, this means that there is another person who is receiving the fruits of your efforts and learning. If one sees that he is picking up cookies In a dream, it means that this person will be able to take responsibility and be smart and aware of what is happening around him. If one sees that he is eating cookies in a dream, then this dream is evidence that this person will have a lot of livelihood in the coming days If a person sees in a dream that he is eating chocolate cookies, then this dream is evidence that this person is committing some sins while turning away from God Almighty. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating salty cookies In a dream, this dream indicates that this girl may be about to get engaged. Also, eating biscuits in a dream for a single girl is evidence that she finds someone who will make her life easier and share her sadness, and that could be in the form of a partner. If an unmarried girl sees a A spoiled cookie in a dream, this dream shows many problems and fears that you are experiencing at this time. title: Interpretation of dreams about someone I know who is sick in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone I know sick in a dream. A person’s illness is associated with feelings of fear, anxiety and pain, especially if it is related to someone from the circle of acquaintances or relatives. The world of dreams, and you may also be interested in knowing Friday in a dream, and in this context, we will get to know you in this article, the interpretation of seeing someone I know sick in a dream. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream Interpretation of seeing someone I know sick in a dream The interpretation of seeing someone you know sick in a dream varies, depending on the type of illness, as well as the extent of the patient's relationship with the owner of the dream, as follows: If a person sees his parents sick in a dream, this is evidence of his shortcomings in their rights and shows the extent of his suffering and the influence of the parents in this matter. In this case, the person must return to his senses, and fix his relationship with his parents, so that he obtains their satisfaction and the satisfaction of the Lord of the Worlds - God willing -. Scholars agreed that a person sees one of his family members in a dream, and he is suffering from a serious illness. This indicates goodness and blessing for the owner of the dream. It heralds goodness and abundance for him that awaits him in the coming period. While Imam Ibn Shaheen interpreted this matter as it may indicate the death of the one who appeared sick in the dream. Especially if the owner of the dream was having a dialogue with that sick person in the dream. Seeing a sick person in a dream, although he is in good health and healthy in reality , can be interpreted as a hypocrite. It shows the dreamer his love and loyalty, and it contains hatred, enmity and hatred. Read also: I saw my husband getting married Interpretation of a sick person visiting a pregnant woman A pregnant woman's fear of labor pains can directly affect her dreams. She may also see one of her relatives or acquaintances suffering from illness and pain. It can be noted that this dream repeats itself, especially in the last months of pregnancy that coincide with the approaching date of her birth. As for if she sees her husband in a dream, suffering from an illness, this is considered a good omen, heralding an easy and easy birth for her - God willing -. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sick person crying in a dream Crying in dreams is associated with sadness, repentance, exposure and solving intractable problems. If one sees a sick person crying in a dream, then the illness here is a sign of a physical or psychological illness that this person suffers from. Crying in this case is a sign of relief from distress and liberation from evils and dangers. You may also be interested in knowing: A tooth falling out in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream for a married woman Scholars unanimously agree that if a woman sees her husband A sick person in a dream, she tries to treat him and relieve his pain. This means that this woman will go through a major financial crisis, and will live difficult days, for which she must be prepared. However, if the dream ends with her husband’s recovery, this indicates that this crisis will end peacefully in the near future - God willing -. Read also: Entering the Police College in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that the man she loves is sick, this may indicate problems and disagreements in her relationship with this man.
